com.github.codelomer.configprotection.model.params.impl

Class ConfigNumberParams<V extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.codelomer.configprotection.model.params.AbstractConfigParams<V,ConfigNumberParams<V>>
      • com.github.codelomer.configprotection.model.params.impl.ConfigNumberParams<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the number value

    public class ConfigNumberParams<V extends java.lang.Number>
extends AbstractConfigParams<V,ConfigNumberParams<V>>
    Represents the parameters for validating and retrieving a number value from a configuration section.
